page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: THE NEW MALDEN/WORCESTER PARK AREA IS PREDOMINANTLY A RESIDENTIAL ONE.IT IS A COMMUTER SUBURB OF LONDON CONSISTING OF SEMI-DETACHED AND DETACHED HOUSES, BUNGALOWS AND A FEW FLATS SET IN QUIET, TREE LINED ROADS. MOST OF THE HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT IN THE TWENTIETH CENTURY AND CONSEQUENTLY HAVE PLEASANT FRONT AND BACK GARDENS. THE TYPICAL SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE IN THE AREA CONSISTS OF TWO RECEPTION ROOMS,A KITCHEN AND A HALL DOWNSTAIRS AND THREE BEDROOMS AND A BATHROOM UPSTAIRS.THE HOUSE IS CONSTRUCTED OF BRICK WITH A GABLED ROOF MADE OF CLAY TILES. MOST HOUSES NOW HAVE A GARAGE OR CAR PORT THAT HOUSES THE FAMILY CAR.
